column4: I upgraded my Linux Dell laptop to Jaunty and now I can't play any videos.
did you download the codecs? you might need to re-download them.
how do I do that?
or inslall vlc
I already have vlc.  All the players crash with the "badalloc insufficient resources for operation" error
oh... thats weird..
try re-loading vlc
like apt-get remove and apt-get install?
yes
tried that
have you googled the error message?
yes, it seems to be quite common
but doesn't seem to apply to me
what was the error again?
badalloc insufficient resources for operation
and you upgraded?
the trouble started after I upgraded to Jaunty.
It was working fine before.
did you upgrade or do a clean install?
upgrade from 8.10
the easiest way would probably be to do a clean install for 9.04 because upgrading can produce problems
clean install is not an option
oh..
see if this can help you at all
